overview: Director Jim Holliday delivers another tongue-in-cheek look at the most outrageous stewardess school around. The plot centers on a group of busty young women whose stewardess training leaves them plenty of time for freaky fun. They decide to try and get a chapter of a national sorority to open up on campus, and they're ready and willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen. Whether with faculty, friends or their fellow students, these enticing lust bunnies aim to please! They dabble in everything from back door boffing to lesbian lust, and are always ready for action. It's typical Holliday madness, filled with gorgeous women, blisteringly hot sex and plenty of lusty laughs.
title: Sorority Stewardesses
